pr_title: [#10031] Cancel causes permissions to be shown incorrectly in instructor course edit page

timeline.message: Add field to store original panel

timeline.bodyText: I think this is shadow copy, which means that the second time you click cancel and come again will reproduce the issue you mentioned?
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: Why saving instructor need to restore the panel?
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: It is to update the copy with the new saved values
replies.author: jtankw3

timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.message: Change to deep copy for originalPanel
